_meanings:
{@--3@} To receive or accept
as a present.

{@--4@} To receive 
inimically, oppose, encounter, resist; to
attack, assault; {#pratijagrAha#} 
{#kAliMgastamastrErgajasADanaH#} <ls>R. 4. 40</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 47.</ls>

{@--6@} To obey, conform or listen
to.

{@--7@} To resort to, betake oneself
to.

{@--1@} To cause to accept,
give, present.
